word:
With blasphemous boldness almost beyond belief, one of the priests of the new order said: “God, if you exist, avenge your injured name. I bid you defiance! You remain silent. You dare not launch your thunders! Who, after this, will believe in your existence?” What an echo is this 
275
of the Pharaoh's demand: “Who is Jehovah, that I should obey his voice?” “I know not Jehovah!”
